name: Cirio Pizza Sauce
description: Bursting with the taste of sun-ripened tomatoes, finely chopped tomatoes to produce a thick and creamy sauce that is complemented with a finely balanced blend of aromatic mediterranean herbs: basil, oregano, marjoram and onion. The result is a perfect base to bring the taste of authentic Italian pizza to the table. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
